metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6261 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The idna_to_ascii_4i function in lib/idna.c in libidn before 1.33 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and crash) via 64 bytes of input.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6261` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

idn - 1.32-3ubuntu1.1
libidn11 - 1.32-3ubuntu1.1
libidn11-java - 1.32-3ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libidn package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.32-3ubuntu1.1').
